Name: TruthGundlach
Text: President Trump says US is the “piggy bank” the rest of the world wants to steal from. But the US has $124 Trillion in unfunded liabilities!

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Didn’t take long for “Jurassic Joe” Biden to step in it despite attempts to hide rather than campaign. Plagiarism & big flip-flop in 1 week!

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: $ rolling over. Gold up 8 days in a row. Don’t envy the Fed which announces in 10 days. Market pricing: 4 cuts more likely than 1 by yr end.
